doc.author: Ansible Security Automation Team (@maxamillion) <https://github.com/ansible-security>
description: This module allows for the query of Splunk Enterprise Security Correlation Searches
doc.short_description: Manage Splunk Enterprise Security Correlation Searches

splunk.es.splunk_correlation_search_info.examples:
- name: Example usage of splunk.es.correlation_search_info
  splunk.es.correlation_search_info:
    name: "Name of correlation search"
  register: scorrelation_search_info

- name: debug display information gathered
  debug:
    var: scorrelation_search_info
